mobile.name: asp snake
mobile.long_description: A small, poisonous asp slithers over your feet.
mobile.description: The asp is a small, smooth-scaled snake the color of worn pottery. The poison bite of this snake has felled many a mighty pharoah.

mobile.name: cobra snake
mobile.long_description: A cobra snake rears up and opens its fearsome hood.
mobile.description: The cobra snake waves back and forth before you, its hood displaying brilliant colors designed to serve notice to its prey that it is about to strike.

mobile.name: mongoose
mobile.long_description: A small mongoose slinks along the ground, hunting snakes.
mobile.description: The mongoose is a wily rodent, a quick hunter of nasty poisonous snakes. She sniffs you and appears to be looking for food in your hand.

mobile.name: pyramid watcher
mobile.long_description: The pyramid watcher protects the tombs from intruders.
mobile.description: The pyramid watcher has made a pledge to destroy any would-be looters of the tombs of the pharoahs. He is clad from head to foot in utilitarian sand-colored clothing.

mobile.name: thief tomb
mobile.long_description: A sneaky tomb thief moves about in search of treasure.
mobile.description: The thief brushes against you briefly, then slinks back into the shadows.

mobile.name: ali baba thief
mobile.long_description: Ali Baba is here, hunting for the pharoah's tomb.
mobile.description: You see a tall, full-bearded man with a mischevious glint in his eye. Ali Baba has made his life from stealing things from others, including many items stolen recently from under the nose of the hapless guardians of this pyramid. Someday he might get caught, but not today...

mobile.name: magic carpet
mobile.long_description: A small woven carpet lies under your feet.
mobile.description: The carpet is simply beautiful, made from intricately woven silken material. It seems to rise up at the touch of your feet. Wait, it is rising, a few feet above the ground! In fact, it seems to be ALIVE!

mobile.name: mummy corpse
mobile.long_description: A mummy reaches for you, disturbed by your presence.
mobile.description: You only see the disfigured, rotting features of decaying human flesh, animated by the distempered spirit of a long-deceased person.

mobile.name: sand man sandman
mobile.long_description: A sandman rises up from the desert floor.
mobile.description: The sandman is exactly that -- some sort of strange being formed from the sands of the desert floor. It seems quite large and strong and at home in the heat and sandy winds.

mobile.name: efreeti efreet
mobile.long_description: The efreeti stands here, sheathed in a column of fire.
mobile.description: The efreeti is a mighty being formed from living fire. He gazes down at you with disdain and scorn, arms folded across his mighty chest.

mobile.name: caryatid column
mobile.long_description: A sandstone column stands here, carved into a feminine figure.
mobile.description: The column has been carved into a set of four shapely women, each facing outward into the room. The sandstone of the caryatid is smooth with age, but you can still make out a deadly stone sword in the hands of each figure.

mobile.name: djinn genie
mobile.long_description: The djinn issues forth from the confines of a small lamp.
mobile.description: The djinn is a mighty being formed from the air itself and frequently imprisoned in a small lamp, used to do the bidding of those who find him. He smiles down at you congenially, arms folded across his blue-tinged skin, and strokes his goatee.

mobile.name: hieracosphinx sphinx
mobile.long_description: A hieracosphinx looks at you cunningly.
mobile.description: The hieracosphinx are cunning, small, but nasty creatures, having the heads of birds, mighty wingspans, and a full set of four paws to rend their victims to pieces. They tend to be quite jealous of the sharper wits of their older cousins.

mobile.name: gynosphinx sphinx
mobile.long_description: A gynosphinx sits here, befuddled by a riddle.
mobile.description: The gynosphinx is a crafty but gentle creature, having the body of a beautiful dark-skinned woman from the waist up, a feathery set of wings and the hind legs of a mighty cat. Right now she is confused, having just heard a puzzling riddle from a cousin criosphinx.

mobile.name: criosphinx sphinx
mobile.description: The criosphinx is a calm and friendly creature, having the head of a ram atop the body of a well-furred feline with eagle-like wings. He delights in riddles, and in poking occasional fun at his easily confused lesser cousins.

mobile.name: androsphinx sphinx
mobile.long_description: A mighty androsphinx tosses its lion-like mane.
mobile.description: The mighty androsphinx is a huge creature, with the body of a lion whose face is quite man-like, perhaps even handsome, and a massive pair of feathered wings. Tales are told of pharoahs that were rendered permanently deaf by the mighty roar of this sphinx.

mobile.name: great sphinx
mobile.long_description: A mighty sphinx rests here in the sand, dormant now for centuries.
mobile.description: The great sphinx towers tens of feet above you, resting here in a state of dormancy. It has become almost indistinguishable from the sand that surrounds it, although you can still make out the features of the handsome face that once advised many rulers.

mobile.name: ramses mummy
mobile.long_description: You have awakened the mighty servant to the pharoahs, Ramses.
mobile.description: As your light spills over his face and body, you can see his features begin to fill out, swell, and harden, until an apparently healthy man stands before you, clad only in the raiments he was left in when he last slept. His hair is a soft black, his skin a deep chocolate, and his tall frame is totally still, his chest not even moving to breathe.
